properties.displayName: Potentially Suspicious Regsvr32 HTTP IP Pattern
properties.description:
Detects regsvr32 execution to download and install DLLs located remotely where the address is an IP address.
Source URL: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_regsvr32_http_ip_pattern.yml
Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Date Modified: 2023-05-24
Status: experimental
References: https://twitter.com/mrd0x/status/1461041276514623491, https://twitter.com/tccontre18/status/1480950986650832903, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Regsvr32/
False Positives: FQDNs that start with a number such as "7-Zip"
properties.query:
_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessName endswith "\\regsvr32.exe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "REGSVR32.EXE") and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://1" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://2" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://3" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://4" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://5" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://6" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://7" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://8" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:http://9" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://1" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://2" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://3" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://4" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://5" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://6" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://7" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://8" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /i:https://9" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://1" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://2" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://3" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://4" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://5" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://6" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://7" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://8" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:http://9" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://1" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://2" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://3" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://4" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://5" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://6" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://7" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://8" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -i:https://9"))
